title: Glacier National Park: Cross-country Skiing
body: Cross Country Skiing and Snowshoeing         Glacier has winter recreation opportunities for all skill levels. Jean Tabbert  Winter ski and snowshoe trails throughout Glacier offer access to spectacular scenery and some uncrowded recreational opportunities. Visit our special Skiing and Snowshoeing page for maps of ski trails and more details. Check for area and trail closures and current avalanche conditions, especially if you plan to go downhill backcountry skiing. Download the Skiing and Snowshoeing brochure, a large pdf (38MB) packed with information.
